content.text:
# Beware of the Dog (novel)

Beware of the Dog is 1992 Australian novel by Peter Corris featuring private detective Cliff Hardy. It was the 15th book in the series.
Reception
The Canberra Times said it " concluded with the most graphic violence in that series so far."
The Sydney Sun Herald wrote "Corris is in fine form... overall a good read."
See also
* 1992 in Australian literature
